# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed with exceptional quality and functionality in mind. This product truly stands out in its category and offers unparalleled benefits. Given its unique features and high standards, we believe it's worth more than what others might charge. I'm extending this opportunity to you for a special introductory price of $150. This is an exclusive offer tailored for someone like you who appreciates the value in premium products. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the excellence firsthand. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
